留言內容: Beautiful and flattering on. The fit is perfect. I wear a medium but purchased a large based on reviews, I love it. There’s not really any stretch to the top so a size larger was best for comfort. Washes up well, air dry. You won’t be disappointed.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風花卉印花 V 領長袖抽繩上衣 寬鬆襯衫 鈕扣襯衫
留言內容: I recently purchased the SHEWIN Women's Casual Boho Floral Print V Neck Long Sleeve Drawstring Top, and I must say, it's a delightful addition to my wardrobe. This blouse combines comfort, style, and versatility in one package.First and foremost, the floral print is absolutely charming. It adds a touch of boho chic to my look, making it suitable for both casual outings and more dressed-up occasions. The colors are vibrant and haven't faded after multiple washes.The V-neck design is flattering and provides a relaxed fit that's perfect for everyday wear. The drawstring detail allows for a customized fit and adds a stylish element to the blouse.The long sleeves are a practical feature, making this top suitable for transitional weather or cooler evenings. The lightweight fabric is breathable and comfortable, ensuring I can wear it all day without feeling overheated.Button-down shirts are a timeless classic, and this blouse offers a refreshing take on that style. It's easy to put on and take off, thanks to the buttons, and it can be styled in various ways – whether tucked into jeans or worn loosely with leggings.Moreover, the quality of the material and stitching is evident. It has held up well to regular wear and washing, maintaining its shape and color.In summary, the SHEWIN Women's Casual Boho Floral Print V Neck Long Sleeve Drawstring Top is a fashionable and versatile addition to any wardrobe. Its comfort, stylish design, and quality make it a top choice for everyday wear. I highly recommend this blouse to anyone looking for a chic and comfortable addition to their clothing collection.

留言內容: I was super skeptical about buying a blouse off of Amazon, but it appeared on my home page at a price I couldn't pass up. It arrived within 7-10 days, and when I took it out of the package I was pleasantly surprised. The floral print is trendy and the colors offer lots of versatility, so accessorizing is effortless. It's a bit larger than I expected (it's roomy, ladies - I could have ordered a size down and it would have been fine). The buttons down the front are kind of open, so IMO, it requires some kind of base garment under it like a tank or cami, otherwise your undergarments *will* show. Once I tucked a bit of the front in and adjusted the sleeves, it was lovely and not worth the hassle of exchanging for a smaller size. This isn't a piece that will last you several seasons, but given the price point, it's a fun addition to my spring and summer wardrobe that I'd expect will hold up for two or three seasons.

留言內容: I am 5’5” at 148 pounds. I bought the large as a prefer room in the shoulders. I typically wear a 12 in a work blouse. Fits as expected. It’s a full flowy top. Lite weight and perfect for work or casual wear. Color is just as expected, a vibrant violet and blue.
